channel.title: Custom NPC Help
channel.description:
Base: [PI] InsidiaX v2
I recently added nex (custom npc) and when it attacks me it takes no damage and no hitmarks come up?
Oh and i've added it in npc.cfg already
[img]http://s15.postimage.org/703bqycvv/Untitled.gif[/img]

item.title: Custom NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[quote=“joeaye, post:9, topic:439028”][quote author=hasumon link=topic=541729.msg3968573#msg3968573 date=1333948053]
Did you set this npc to attack a player farther than one square?
[/quote]

Yes, even when i’m right next to it same results.[/quote]
I’m pretty sure there is more code to input for an npc when you set a npc to attack farther than one square since it is using more than one method (If i am not mistaken). Forgot a quite bit of runescape emulator code but look in npc.java, npchandler.java, and npc.cfg to fix it. Forgetting which one it was but it is in the same file as were you set max hits.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @joeaye joeaye
item.description:
@joeaye wrote:

hasumon:

Does this source still use that specific npc id method in npc.cfg that does a specific amount of damage crap? Did you add this specific id into the file?

in npc.cfg its the id, name, combat, health

And yes i added the id to it.

item.title: Custom NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Did you added to your npc handler? I had the same problem when i spawn white knights and i had to add their x and y’s to where I spawn them here is what mine looks like…White knights

/* 19 */3314, 3315, 3316, 3318, 3315, 3316, 3317, 3318,
					3314, 3315, 3316, 3317, 3318, 3314, 3315, 3316, 3314, 3315,
					3337, 3250, 3336, 3250, 3337, 3252, 3336, 3252,

19 is its spawn code and the first number(3314) is the x and the second (3315) is the y and it switchs…did you do that part?

Read full topic
